company_info.name: Dextrends
company_info.description: Leading technology company specializing in digital financial services and blockchain solutions
company_info.mission: Empowering businesses and individuals with cutting-edge financial technology and blockchain innovations

services.title: Digital Payment Solutions
services.description: Comprehensive digital payment platform offering secure, fast, and cost-effective transaction processing for businesses of all sizes. Features include multi-currency support, real-time settlement, fraud detection, and seamless API integration.
benefits: Reduce payment processing costs by up to 40%
Improve cash flow with instant settlements
Enhanced security with advanced fraud protection
services.pricing: Competitive transaction fees starting at 1.5% per transaction

services.title: Blockchain Asset Management
services.description: Enterprise-grade blockchain asset management platform providing secure custody, trading, and portfolio management for digital assets including cryptocurrencies, NFTs, and tokenized securities.
services.pricing: Custom pricing based on assets under management

services.title: Smart Contract Development
services.description: Professional smart contract development and auditing services for Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Polygon, and other major blockchain networks. Includes custom DApp development and blockchain integration.

services.title: Digital Identity Verification
services.description: Advanced KYC/AML compliance platform using AI-powered identity verification, document authentication, and risk assessment for financial institutions and fintech companies.
services.pricing: Per verification pricing starting at $2.50 per check

services.title: DeFi Integration Platform
services.description: Comprehensive DeFi integration platform enabling traditional financial institutions to access decentralized finance protocols safely and compliantly through institutional-grade infrastructure.
benefits: Access to higher yields than traditional finance
services.pricing: Management fee of 0.5% - 2% annually depending on services

services.title: Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC) Solutions
services.description: Complete CBDC infrastructure solutions for central banks and government institutions, including wallet systems, payment rails, and regulatory frameworks for digital currency implementation.
services.pricing: Custom enterprise pricing for government institutions

services.title: Cryptocurrency Trading Platform
services.description: Professional-grade cryptocurrency trading platform with advanced order types, portfolio management tools, and institutional-level security for professional traders and financial institutions.
services.pricing: Tiered fee structure from 0.1% to 0.5% per trade

services.title: Tokenization Services
services.description: End-to-end asset tokenization platform for converting real-world assets into blockchain tokens, including real estate, commodities, art, and securities with full regulatory compliance.
services.pricing: Setup fee starting at $25,000 plus ongoing management fees
